public class LedSubsystem extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase
A subsystem for controlling the LED strip.

      public void setOrbit(int r1, int g1, int b1, int r2, int g2, int b2, double percentLed)
      Set up an orbiting action on the LED strip
      Parameters:
      r1 - the red part of the color
      g1 - the green part of the color
      b1 - the blue part of the color
      r2 - the red part of the color
      g2 - the green part of the color
      b2 - the blue part of the color
      percentLed - the amount of leds to orbit
